{{Wired embedded system |brand=RPF |model=Raspberry Pi |revision=Model B (512MB) |upc= |ean= |asin= |price=35 |est_release_date=10/2012 |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=single-board computer |fcc_id= |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=0.7 |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM2835 |cpu1_cspeed=700 |cpu1_cores=1 |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=0 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4P4G324EB-AGC1 |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=SD Card,USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial= |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand=SMSC |eth_chip1_model=LAN9512 |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=HDMI out, audio out (3.5mm) |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui_eth=B8:27:EB }} [http://www.raspberrypi.org/product/model-b/ Product page] {{WPLink|Raspberry Pi}} :[http://elinux.org/RaspberryPiBoard '''elinux.org''''s Raspberry Pi subsection] :[http://elinux.org/RaspberryPi_Boards Board revision table w/ pictures] The board used to populate this entry is marked '''1238''' (2012, week 38).
Model B '''Pi'''s use a '''SMSC''' LAN9512 (LAN9512-JZX) USB 2.0 hub and FE controller. ==Additional external links== *[http://www.raspberrypi.org/archives/6299 '''''A birthday present from Broadcom''''' on the '''Raspberry Pi Foundation''''s news feed] :Full documentation for the '''VideoCore IV''' graphics core (used in the BCM2835) as well :as a complete source release of the graphics stack used by the BCM21553 cellphone SoC :(which also has a '''VideoCore IV''' core) has been released ===Models=== *[[RPF Raspberry Pi Model B (512MB)]] [http://www.raspberrypi.org/product/model-b/ PPage] [http://www.opennet.ru/opennews/art.shtml?num=40202 on '''OpenNet'''] :SoC Broadcom BCM2835 1-cores CPU ARM11 (ARM1176JZF-S ARMv6 @700MHz) : 512MB RAM, 2x USB 2.0 *[[RPF Raspberry Pi Model B+ (512MB)]] [http://www.raspberrypi.org/product/model-b-plus/ PPage] [http://www.opennet.ru/opennews/art.shtml?num=40202 on '''OpenNet'''] :SoC Broadcom BCM2835 1-cores CPU ARM11 (ARM1176JZF-S ARMv6 @700MHz) : 512MB RAM, 4x USB 2.0 *[[RPF Raspberry Pi 2 Model B (1GB)]] [http://www.raspberrypi.org/products/raspberry-pi-2-model-b/ PPage] [http://www.opennet.ru/opennews/art.shtml?num=41585 on '''OpenNet'''] :SoC Broadcom BCM2836 4-cores CPU Cortex A7 (ARMv7 @900MHz) :1GB RAM, 4x USB 2.0 __NOTOC__
